definitions.definition: Liking or tending to express a contradicting viewpoint , especially from one held by a majority of people.
Having an opinion of market trends at variance with most others.

main_definition: Liking or tending to express a contradicting viewpoint , especially from one held by a majority of people. [from late 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( finance ) Having an opinion of market trends at variance with most others.
